DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine duloxetine help patient painful diabetic neuropathy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Treatment Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
DOC.criteria: Patients pain due bilateral peripheral neuropathy induce type 1 2 diabetes mellitus . The pain must present least 6 month evaluable foot , leg , hand . Participants hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) less equal 9.0 percent Visit 1 . Participants HbA1c measure 4270 day Visit 1 subsequent HbA1c level within +/ 1.0 percent level Visit 1 . Participants mean 24hour average pain severity score ( round whole number ) 4 high , calculated patient diary 7 day immediately Visit 2 Participants undergone renal transplant currently renal dialysis . Participants history require pharmacotherapy within past year current history psychiatric disease , mania , bipolar disorder , depression , anxiety disorder , eat disorder . Participants hypertension poor control blood pressure ( systolic blood pressure great equal 180 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) diastolic blood pressure great equal 110 mmHg Participants alanine transaminase ( ALT ) aspartate transaminase ( AST ) great equal 100 Units per Liter ( U/L ) Visit 1 . Participants unable discontinue prohibit concomitant drug concomitant therapy Visit 1 .
